Description_lang: Guardian Spirit's duration is increased by ${$s2/1000}.1 sec, and it increases healing received by an additional |cFFFFFFFF${$s1}.1%|r.

description_blz.en_US: Guardian Spirit's duration is increased by 2.0 sec, and it increases healing received by an additional 10.0%.
description_blz.es_MX: La duración de Espíritu guardián aumenta 2.0 s y la sanación recibida aumenta un 10.0% más.
description_blz.pt_BR: Espírito Guardião tem mais 2,0 s de duração e aumenta em 10,0% a cura recebida.
description_blz.de_DE: Erhöht die Dauer von 'Schutzgeist' um 2,0 Sek. und den Bonus auf die erhaltene Heilung um zusätzlich 10,0%.
description_blz.en_GB: Guardian Spirit's duration is increased by 2.0 sec, and it increases healing received by an additional 10.0%.
description_blz.es_ES: La duración de Espíritu guardián aumenta 2,0 s, y aumenta la sanación recibida un 10,0% más.
description_blz.fr_FR: La durée d’Esprit gardien est augmentée de 2,0 s et cette technique augmente les soins reçus de 10,0% supplémentaires.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta la durata di Spirito Custode di 2,0 s e ne aumenta il bonus alle cure ricevute del 10,0%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Продлевает время действия "Оберегающего духа" на 2,0 сек., при этом получаемое исцеление усиливается еще на 10,0%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 수호 영혼의 지속시간이 2.0초만큼 증가하며, 받는 치유 효과를 추가로 10.0%만큼 증가시킵니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 守護聖靈的持續時間延長2.0秒，並且使受到的治療額外提高10.0%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 守护之魂的持续时间延长2.0秒，并且使获得的治疗效果额外提高10.0%。
